004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.event;
006
007import java.util.Collection;
008import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
009import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
010
011/** The loop polling {@link BooleanEvent} objects and executing the actions bound to them. */
012public final class EventLoop {
013  private final Collection<Binding> m_bindings = new LinkedHashSet<>();
014
015  /**
016   * Bind a new action to run whenever the condition is true.
017   *
018   * @param condition the condition to listen to.
019   * @param action the action to run.
020   */
021  public void bind(BooleanSupplier condition, Runnable action) {
022    m_bindings.add(new Binding(condition, action));
023  }
024
025  /** Poll all bindings. */
026  public void poll() {
027    m_bindings.forEach(Binding::poll);
028  }
029
030  /** Clear all bindings. */
031  public void clear() {
032    m_bindings.clear();
033  }
034
035  private static class Binding {
036    private final BooleanSupplier m_condition;
037    private final Runnable m_action;
038
039    private Binding(BooleanSupplier condition, Runnable action) {
040      this.m_condition = condition;
041      this.m_action = action;
042    }
043
044    void poll() {
045      if (m_condition.getAsBoolean()) {
046        m_action.run();
047      }
048    }
049  }
050}
